thread.title: Netage Solutions Formally Renames to Dynamo Software
thread.title_full: Netage Solutions Formally Renames to Dynamo Software

author: Jason Doring
title: Netage Solutions Formally Renames to Dynamo Software
text:
Netage Solutions, Inc., a leading provider of CRM, deal management, fundraising, portfolio and investor management, and reporting software for alternative asset firms and their investors, is proud to announce their renaming to Dynamo Software, effective immediately. A pioneer in creating industry-specific end-to-end software solutions for the alternative asset industry’s most prominent fund managers and investors, the Dynamo Software rename aligns the company with their flagship Dynamo™ platform, and the brand’s trusted reputation throughout the alternative investment marketplace.
“When Netage Solutions was founded seventeen years ago, the Internet was still in its nascent stages, and we were seeking a unique avenue within this powerful medium,” stated Dynamo Software’s CEO, Krassen Draganov. “Our clients partnered with us to forge a software platform that is trusted by thousands of global users, and we are pleased to link our corporate identity with the tangible results of those collaborations.”
Profitable since inception, Dynamo Software continues to achieve organic growth milestones in revenue, client count, and internal headcount. Most recently, Dynamo Software’s client base exceeded 350 firms managing over $1 trillion in assets. Dynamo Software is also celebrating the October 2015 launch of a dedicated London office, which will provide a hands-on, personalized service experience for the European market and is staffed by highly experienced client service and sales professionals.
About Dynamo Software
Dynamo Software, formerly Netage Solutions, has provided premium industry-specific, configurable asset management and reporting software for the alternative assets industry since 1998, including private equity and venture capital funds, real estate investment firms, hedge funds, funds of funds, prime brokers, foundations, endowments, pension funds, and family offices. Intuitive and highly configurable, the Dynamo™ platform has improved the productivity of fundraising, deal, research, investor relationship, and portfolio management teams worldwide. Collectively, our 350+ clients manage over $1 trillion in assets. Media inquiries may be directed to Jason Doring at 617.612.5253 or jason(at)dynamosoftware(dot)com.
